guidetextdraw_copy_c._value:
Notes:

- The above image shows what we are trying to replicate

- Tables look different in edit vs preview, always check how your table will look like

- Medium to big tables look and always looked bad on mobile

- Add notes so the user know how to interact with the tables

 

Pencil icon: click to edit

Plus icon: click to add new entry

Bin icon: click to remove entry
guidetextdraw_copy_c.name: textdraw1729611105969_copy_1_copy_1
guidetextdraw_copy_c.text:
Notes:

- Tables look different in edit vs preview, always check how your table will look like

- Medium to big tables look and always looked bad on mobile

- Add notes so the user know how to interact with the tables

Â 

Pencil icon: click to edit

Plus icon: click to add new entry

Bin icon: click to remove entry

guidetextdraw_310777127._value:
Some issues here:

- too many columns in the table

- doesn't look good especially on mobile

Workarounds:

- hide the table row

- hide the field labels

Downsides:

- less intuitive
guidetextdraw_310777127.name: textdraw_3107771271729782859180

guidetextdraw_310777._value:
Notice:

- not as many columns > starts looking better

- can display the table header

Some issues here:

- text box that allows multiple lines gets resized by the table actions

Workarounds:

- add a dummy section that keeps the place for those actions: eg actions column with a blank text in table row

Downsides:

- general: difficult to interact with on mobile
guidetextdraw_310777.name: textdraw_3107771271729782859180

guidetextdraw_310777._value:
Construction:

- section panel that includes:

1. the panel that will have multiple instances

2. the add button

- for the section that will repeat: add a panel

1. any fields required to be filled in

2. add delete button

 

Notes:

- adding the delete button in the inner panel, will remove the instance that contains the button

- pay attention to the implemented rules and if you are having any issues, debug the section in a separate AF
guidetextdraw_310777.name: textdraw_3107771271729782859180
guidetextdraw_310777.text:
Construction:

- section panel that includes:

1. the panel that will have multiple instances

2. the add button

- for the section that will repeat: add a panel

1. any fields required to be filled in

2. add delete button

Â 

Notes:

- adding the delete button in the inner panel, will remove the instance that contains the button

- pay attention to the implemented rules and if you are having any issues, debug the section in a separate AF
